name: Egress (itch) (Xenik)
description:
Egress is a platformer, that heavily relies on puzzles and building mechanics.

Complete Freedom!

Each level can be completed in different ways. There isn't just one correct playthrough. Improvise!

Dozens of unique levels!
There are 4 locations each in its own style.

Plenty of playable characters!
All characters have their own in-game perfomance, which may affect gameplay.

Build menu!
Teleport, anti-gravity device and many more!
